@Fridder wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && c.playerRights == 0) if (c.inWild()) return; { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); else { if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0) && (!newItemID == 1054) && (!newItemID == 1055)) //etc etc etc { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("No such item."); } } } else { } } catch(Exception e) {

Shitty but works.

item.title: ::item help please REP++ if you find!
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

hey guys i have a server that’s based on OverloadX[PI], and there are some players that join and manage to ::item a phat or something else that’s rare any ideas how i can stop them from doing this.
what i think = they are using bomb client or they found a way to bug the system!
btw, this is a spawn server

Little ::item commands

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && c.playerRights == 0) if (c.inWild()) return; { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ( (newItemID == 13899) || (newItemID == 11287) || (newItemID == 1037) || (newItemID == 1038) || (newItemID == 15001) || (newItemID == 11286) || (newItemID == 1038) || (newItemID == 1039) || (newItemID == 1040) || (newItemID == 1041) || (newItemID == 1042) || (newItemID == 1043) || (newItemID == 1044) || (newItemID == 1045) || (newItemID == 1046) || (newItemID == 1041) || (newItemID == 1042) || (newItemID == 1043) || (newItemID == 1044) || (newItemID == 1045) || (newItemID == 1046) || (newItemID == 1047) || (newItemID == 1048) || (newItemID == 1049) || (newItemID == 1050) || (newItemID == 1051) || (newItemID == 1052) || (newItemID == 1053) || (newItemID == 1054) || (newItemID == 1055) || (newItemID == 1056) || (newItemID == 1057))) { c.sendMessage("You are Cant spawn this item"); } else { if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("No such item."); } } } else { } } catch(Exception e) {
Rep ++
i deleted some (newItemID == 1056) when i putted this in here so it wouldn’t be such a huge file!

Read full topic
